body_html:
tensorflow-serving-api is the right package name to use, tensorflow-serving-client is not affiliated with the project and is published by another company.

The package indeed only exists for python 2, so that's likely the reason it's not finding it.
body_text:
tensorflow-serving-api is the right package name to use, tensorflow-serving-client is not affiliated with the project and is published by another company.
The package indeed only exists for python 2, so that's likely the reason it's not finding it.
body:
`tensorflow-serving-api` is the right package name to use, [tensorflow-serving-client](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tensorflow-serving-client) is not affiliated with the project and is published by another company.

The package indeed only exists for python 2, so that's likely the reason it's not finding it.
